Room.Name: Avatar Boulevard/Darmanian Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Avatar Boulevard and Darmanian Way.
Room.LongDescription: Darmanian Way heads off to the west from the intersection with Avatar Boulevard, which continues to the north and south. On the southwestern corner of the intersection, you can see the beach formed by the massive Lyanden Lake. In the center of the lake, you can see the magnificent Lyanden Castle.
